snippet.title: Batora: Lost Haven | Gameplay Reveal Trailer and PC Closed Alpha Announcement
snippet.description:
We officially opened the registration for the first closed PC alpha test for Batora: Lost Haven!

From July 21st to August 4th, you’ll have the opportunity to have a taste of the game and start to learn how to face quests, puzzles, and enemies by balancing your physical and mental powers!

If you are already subscribed to the newsletter, great news: you don’t need to do anything, you’re already in!

If you don’t, subscribe by July 20th at 4 PM CET and get access to the Closed Alpha and unlock exclusive rewards ➡️ https://bit.ly/batora-alpha
